title: The Mayakovski Assignment
description: It is the height of the Cold War and the Russians are working on a secret new weapons system codenamed Project Helena. When their top scientist Dr Andrei Mayakovski tries unsuccessfully to defect to the West to join his wife Anna, the Americans and the British hatch a plan to send one of their agents into Russia to help him escape. British Agent Patrick Kane enlists the help of the Vasyuchenko’s, Dr Mayakovski’s closest friends, and together they begin a journey fraught with danger and with the KGB in hot pursuit. Will they manage to evade the KGB?
author: Colin Webster
